snippet: “I’m ready to curse,” the actor and comedian said. “I’m ready to really, really be a bad boy.”
abstract: Comedian Chris Rock, who stars in indie film 2 Days in New York, says he feels compelled to engage with live audiences again after a string of movie roles and work as an executive producer on a new FX talk show.
lead_paragraph: “I’m ready to curse,” the actor and comedian said. “I’m ready to really, really be a bad boy.”

headline.seo: Q. and A.: Chris Rock Is Itching for Dirty Work
headline.main: Busy Chris Rock Is Just Itching for Dirty Work
headline.print_headline: Busy Chris Rock Is Just Itching For Dirty Work
